text: I really want to get this game. I've always loved the tekken series, and tekken tag tournament has to be my favorite tekken game, one of my favorite games ever. I kinda of lost track once they made the transition to ps3, since I never got one, but I'll probably buy this once I get a WiiU

text: This game is quite awesome, it's probably my favorite 3D fighter (I'm more of a 2D fighter person in general). I played the Wii U version and the added Nintendo content is very funny, I like how the Tekken series always has a light hearted side to it.
author: SupraDarky
